categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Bloodletter was the nickname of a corporate spy hired in 31 BBY by the Vratix Ashern group to infiltrate the Bacta Cartel. Surviving a close encounter with a Mandalorian warrior, Bloodletter discovered the existence of the hybrid kolcta. Soon after the Bacta War, Bloodletter released a memoir of the Thriving Season, Thrive or Die.
